div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _AdministrationDetectedIssueCode
Import all the codes that are contained in AppropriatenessDetectedIssueCode
Import all the codes that are contained in DosageProblemDetectedIssueCode
Import all the codes that are contained in ComplianceDetectedIssueCode
Import all the codes that are contained in TimingDetectedIssueCode

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
CodeDisplayDefinition
_AdministrationDetectedIssueCodeAdministrationDetectedIssueCodeAdministration of the proposed therapy may be inappropriate or contraindicated as proposed

description.value: Administration of the proposed therapy may be inappropriate or contraindicated as proposed
